animes.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animes.description: After a failed alchemical ritual leaves brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric with severely damaged bodies, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them; the legendary Philosopher's Stone.

animes.title: Steins;Gate
animes.description: A self-proclaimed mad scientist discovers a way to time travel through a microwave, leading to a complex web of time manipulation and its consequences on the future of mankind.

animes.title: Attack on Titan
animes.description: Humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason.

animes.title: Death Note
animes.description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing the victim's name, leading him to attempt to create a crime-free world as a god-like vigilante.

animes.title: Demon Slayer
animes.description: In Taisho-era Japan, Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister turned into a demon. He embarks on a dangerous journey to cure his sister and avenge his family.

animes.title: One Punch Man
animes.description: Saitama is a hero who only became a hero for fun. After three years of special training, he's become so strong that he's practically invincible. In fact, he's too strongâ€”even his mightiest opponents are taken out with a single punch.

animes.title: My Hero Academia
animes.description: In a world where 80% of the population has superpowers, Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without powers, enrolls in a prestigious hero academy to fulfill his dream of becoming the greatest hero.

animes.title: Hunter x Hunter (2011)
animes.description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks for his father who left him when he was younger.

animes.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
animes.description: Yuji Itadori, a high school student with extraordinary physical abilities, gets involved in the world of Cursed Spirits after swallowing a powerful cursed object to save his friends.

animes.title: Code Geass
animes.description: After being exiled from his homeland, Lelouch, a prince of the Britannian Empire, gains the power to control others' minds. He uses this ability to lead a rebellion against his father's empire.
